title: This massive power bank is $60 off and ready for your 2025 adventures
content:
Macworld

If you’re always ready to go on adventures off the beaten path, then this Anker Solix C200 power bank station should be on your shopping list, especially now that it’s only $110, a $60 discount from its usual MSRP.

What makes the Anker Solix C200 so awesome? Well, first of all, it has an absolutely massive capacity of 60,000mAh—that’s about what you need to recharge your phone at least ten times over. The high capacity makes it ideal for powering devices for longer periods of time, such as camping trips.

There are multiple ports available to handle charging your devices, including a 140W USB-C port that is ideal to use to charge high-power devices, including laptops, quickly. The power bank features three USB-C ports and two USB-A ports. As far as recharging the Anker power bank goes, you have three options. You can pick between the 140W PD USB-C port, use 100W solar panels, or use the car socket. All of these will get you back to 100 percent in a couple of hours.

So, go and save $60 on the Anker Solix C200 and be prepared for all sorts of adventures without worrying about your phone battery—or anything else that might need a charge.
